FROMXBM(6D)                                         FROMXBM(6D)





NAME
       fromxbm - convert an X Bitmap image into an IRIS image

SYNOPSIS
       fromxbm xbitmap outimage.bw

DESCRIPTION
       fromxbm  converts  an  X  Bitmap file into an IRIS image
       file.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004               FROMXBM(6D)
